title: Flemish nationalist Bart De Wever sworn in as Belgium's new prime minister
snippet: Bart De Wever was sworn in by King Philippe after a coalition agreement was found Friday, following seven months of negotiations. He is the first Flemish nationalist to lead Belgium's government.

title: Bart De Wever - Wikipedia
snippet: De Wever stated in his initial address that the core focuses of his government would be on welfare and tax reform, stricter immigration policies, reductions in European Union regulations, expanding nuclear power and increasing Belgium's defence spending to 2% of GDP by 2029 to meet NATO commitments.

title: Composition of the Belgian federal government | Belgium.be
snippet: Mr. Bart De Wever, Prime Minister Mr. David Clarinval, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Employment, Economy and Agriculture

title: Prime Minister of Belgium - Wikipedia
snippet: Bart De Wever, the (former) leader of New-Flemish Alliance, was appointed as new prime minister on 3 February 2025. He is the first Flemish Nationalist to ever become Premier of Belgium.

title: Prime Minister | Belgium.be
snippet: Read more about Decisions of the Council of Ministers of 24 January 2025
